top_questions.text: A sequential data file called "Marks.dat" contains Students name, address, Rollno, English, Nepali and Computer fields. Write a program to display all the contents of the data file. [4]
What is the name of the functions used in the above program.​

Define Artificial intelligence. Write any two areas where artificial intelligence is used.​ f) What is Computerized database? Write any two benefits of it.​ g) What is table in DBMS? Write method to Construct table.​ h) What is Primary key? Write two advantages of it.​ i) Write any two difference between field name and record.
What is Digital Footprint? Write any two importance of it.​
What is firewall in Computer? Write two major uses of IT policy.​
Write any two examples of IOT.​
The smallest unit to represent information on quantum Computer.
